decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (000 - 003 received 25/05/2017. Location Plan received 22/08/2017. 004 & 007 received 13/09/2017. 005 (Rev B) & 006 (Rev B) received 10/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The dormer window formed in the north facing roofslope shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of roof extensions to the side and rear with two front roof windows to the flat.
